GemP40.name: GemP40
GemP40.desc: Permanently get a 2x EXP boost for the villager of your choice! @ You can only buy this once per villager.

EquipmentPendant31.name: EquipmentPendant31
EquipmentPendant31.desc: This necklace equipment comes with a 1.30X Damage Multi bonus, and +20% Mob Respawn bonus! 20% OFF NORMAL PRICE!

Quest90.name: Quest90
Quest90.desc: I heard about the recent disaster near that hole over in World 5, those poor villagers! Please, take these lanterns and go help them, they're on the house of course!

GemP41.name: GemP41
GemP41.desc: Permanently get a 1.50x boost to resources collected from The Well and The Harp caverns! Two purchases would mean 2.00x resources, three purchases are 2.50x, etc.

Pearl6.name: Pearl6
Pearl6.desc: Gives you 5 Divinity Pearls, which give 40% EXP for the skill that's shown in the corner of the screen! ONLY WORKS FOR SKILLS UNDER LV 50!

GemP42.name: GemP42
GemP42.desc: Gives you +1 Conjure Point to invest in bonuses! If you haven't rescued Cosmo the Conjuror Villager yet, you'll want to hold off buying any of these.

GemP43.name: GemP43
GemP43.desc: Gives you +1 Opal to invest into villagers! You'll find most of your opals in the caverns, but some ended up here! NOTE: You can only buy 4 per day.

Timecandy6.name: Timecandy6
Timecandy6.desc: READ THIS BEFORE YOU BUY. This purchase has a 20% chance for the coveted 72 hr candy, and a 80% chance to just be a lame 12 hour candy. Ok you can stop reading now.

desc: Gives 1 Cosmic Time Candy, which can give up to 500 HOURS of AFK time! On average, it will give 24 hrs.

30% OFF NORMAL PRICE! Gives you 1 World 6 cardpack. You can see the drop table in the Cards section of the gemshop.
